General.Name: Energix Renewable Energies Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Energix - Renewable Energies Ltd. engages in the initiation, development, financing, construction, management, and operation of facilities for the production and storage of electricity from renewable energy sources in Israel, Poland, and the United States. It operates through Photovoltaic, Wind Energy, and Storage segments. The company owns and operates photovoltaic systems and wind farms with a total capacity of 855MW; and storage systems with a capacity of approximately 7GWh. It is also involved in the sale of electricity; and production and sale of green certificates. The company was formerly known as Amot Energy Ltd. and changed its name to Energix - Renewable Energies Ltd. in 2011. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel. Energix - Renewable Energies Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alony Hetz Properties and Investments Ltd.
